title: Graph of deriv., areas given part - c

content.question: On what open intervals contained in 0<x<8 is the graph of f both concave down and increasing? Explain your reasoning.

frqParts.text: On what open intervals contained in 0<x<8 is the graph of f both concave down and increasing? Explain your reasoning.

topic.text: 5.3: Determining Intervals on Which a Function Is Increasing or Decreasing

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify the question to be answered or problem to be solved.
